response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product's features and benefits. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14500}
